body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes               There is no fee to enter Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site - Enjoy your visit!   If you plan to visit other parks with an entrance fee, learn more about the America the Beautiful - The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Passseries and fee-free days in the national parks.
title: Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
